text: Hitobito yo, shito wa tashikani-nushi kara no shinri o motte anata gata no moto ni kita. Dakara anata gata wa shinji nasai. Sore ga anata gata no tame ni mottomo yoi. Tatoe anata gata ga shinjinakute mo, hontoni ten to ji no subete no mono wa, arra no yudearu. Arra wa zenchi ni shite eimei de ara reru
